meanings.definition: More than two but not many
meanings.sent1: There were severals colorful balloons at the party.
meanings.sent2: She picked up severals books from the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with severals yarn balls at once.
meanings.sent4: The sky was filled with severals twinkling stars.
meanings.sent5: The garden was full of severals blooming flowers.

meanings.definition: Separate or distinct individuals or items
meanings.sent1: The teacher handed out severals worksheets to the students.
meanings.sent2: I saw severals birds perched on the fence.
meanings.sent3: The detective examined severals footprints at the crime scene.
meanings.sent4: The museum displayed severals ancient artifacts.
meanings.sent5: The store had severals different types of candy for sale.

meanings.definition: A small number of people or things
meanings.sent1: Severals of my friends are coming to the party.
meanings.sent2: I bought severals apples at the market.
meanings.sent3: The team celebrated with severals high-fives.
meanings.sent4: She received severals compliments on her artwork.
meanings.sent5: Severals of the cookies were missing from the jar.
